dependenciesComments.eslint-config-prettier: a ESLint plugin that turn off all rules that are unnecessary or might conflict with Prettier.
dependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-react: a ESLint plugin that run prettier as an ESLint rule
dependenciesComments.@babel/preset-env: a Babel preset that allow to use latest Javascript syntax
dependenciesComments.@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin: an ESLint plugin which provides lint rules for TypeScript codebases.
dependenciesComments.@typescript-eslint/parser: an ESLint parser which leverages TypeScript ESTree to allow for ESLint to lint TypeScript source code.
